General.Name: Changsha Tongcheng Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Changsha Tongcheng Holdings Co.Ltd engages in commercial retail, comprehensive investment, and tourism hotels businesses in China. The company's commercial retail operation includes shopping centers, department stores, electrical appliances chains, and online professional platforms, as well as offers professional warehousing logistics distribution services. It also provides pawn, small loan, commercial factoring, and consignment services. In addition, the company is involved in the property leasing, property management, and investment activities; and tourism and hotel businesses. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.
General.Address: No.589 Laodong West Road, Changsha, China, 410007
